DOC.brief_summary: It is our goal to study the mechanism of ischemia-reperfusion injury. Our DIEP-operation is actually a clinical model of ischemia-reperfusion. Ischemia-reperfusion injury has never been directly studied in a human, clinical model of autologous transplant.
DOC.brief_title: The DIEP-Flap as a Model of Ischemia-Reperfusion
DOC.criteria: patient is undergoing a DIEPbreast reconstruction, unilateral as well as bilateral is aged 18 years or older diabetes mellitus diseases of the kidneys diseases of the liver patients who are taking immunosuppressants
